import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, Col, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../' const ProductScreen = () => { let match = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.id) return <> GO Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock': 'Out Of Stock'} } export default ProductScreen
